Title: Prohibits fees for the use and occupancy of the state right of way in certain agreements
Summary: Prohibits fees for the use and occupancy of the state right of way in agreements for the installation, modification, relocation, repair, operation or maintenance of fiber optic facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Hway L; amd ยง7, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law and the transportation corporations law, in relation to prohibiting fees for the use and occupancy of the state right of way in certain agreements
